tetra.variant.single_socket/moonstone.de: A gem, attached where the head meets the handle. The gem is enchanted and grants the tool increased damage and efficiency depending on moon phase

tetra/schematic/toolbelt/nullifier.name: Nullifier
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/nullifier.descr: Attach a gravity nullification unit, which lowers the gravity experienced by the belt's wearer. As a side-effect of this, fall damage is also completely nullified.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/mooncatcher.des: Attach a mooncatcher, allowing you to see better under the moonlight. This module will have no effect when moonlight is not present, such as during new moons or when underground.
tetra.improvement.tetrapak/radiant.name: Radiant
tetra.improvement.tetrapak/radiant.descr: The latent energy of Refined Radiance allows this tool to harvest many blocks at a time depending upon the tool's function
tetra.improvement.tetrapak/voiding.name: Voiding
tetra.improvement.tetrapak/voiding.descr: The void powers infused into Shadow Steel give this tool incredible power at the cost of converting ALL drops to experience. Fortune and Looting both increase dropped experience
tetra.improvement.tetrapak/moonstrike.de: The moonstone used to make this tool gains strength based on moon phase
tetrapak.stats.reaping.tooltip: This tool will make undead mobs drop soul shards
tetrapak.stats.voiding.tooltip:
This tool will void the drops of blocks mined and mobs killed with it in exchange for experience

§ex%s §7mob kill experience multiplier
§ex%s §7block experience multiplier
tetrapak.stats.rainbow.tooltip: This tool will break blocks matching its gems color faster
tetrapak.stats.floating.tooltip: This tool defies gravity, causing both drops gathered by the tool and the tool itself to float
tetrapak.stats.deforesting.tooltip: This tool will chop down any tree in a single swing
tetrapak.stats.collapsing.tooltip: This tool will collapse a vertical line of shovelable blocks above it, so long as the blocks are gravity blocks or of the same type
tetrapak.stats.unearthing.tooltip: This tool will mine an entire vein of ore in a single swing
tetrapak.stats.nullifying.tooltip: Wearing this belt will reduce gravity experienced the wearer by §e%s§r
tetrapak.stats.moonstrike.tooltip: This tool will deal §e%s%%§r bonus damage and break blocks §e%s%%§r faster on a full moon. Lesser bonuses apply for intermediate moon phases
tetrapak.stats.regrowth.tooltip:
This tool will repair itself by §e1%%§r of the total durability every §e%s§r seconds

§7In total, it will take around §e%s §7minutes for the tool to fully repair
tetrapak.stats.scorching.tooltip: This tool will scorch drops, processing them the same way a furnace would. Does not affect unsmeltable items
tetrapak.stats.moonsight.tooltip: Wearing this belt will allow the wearer to see better under the moonlight

tetra.variant.single_socket/unholy_symbo: An unholy mark, inscribed where the head meets the handle. The symbol is enchanted and condenses the souls of slain undead into shards.
tetra.variant.double_socket/unholy_symbo: An unholy mark, inscribed onto the side of the tool head. The symbol is enchanted and condenses the souls of slain undead into shards.

tetrapak.advancements.wither_void.title: The Flex
tetrapak.advancements.wither_void.descri: 使用暗影鋼工具殺死凋靈
tetra/schematic/double/sickle/reaping.de: Enchant this tool with dark magic to crystallize the souls of slain undead into soul shards
tetra/schematic/double/axe/cleaving.name: Cleaving
tetra/schematic/double/axe/cleaving.desc: Supernaturally sharpen this tool with dark magic to cause slain monsters to occasionally drop their heads
tetra.improvement.tetrapak/reaping.name: Reaping
tetra.improvement.tetrapak/reaping.descr: This tool is enchanted by dark magic to transform undead monsters into soul shards when slain
tetra.improvement.tetrapak/cleaving.name: Cleaving
tetra.improvement.tetrapak/cleaving.desc: This tool has been sharpened to a razor edge by dark magic, causing slain monsters to occasionally drop their heads
tetrapak.stats.cleaving.tooltip: This tool will make mobs and players occasionally drop their respective heads
